metadata.title: Apply for Citi Double Cash Card - TopFinanzas
metadata.description: Apply for the Citi Double Cash Card online. Earn up to 2% cashback on every purchase with no annual fee.
metadata.keywords: Citi Double Cash Card, credit card application, 2% cashback, no annual fee, TopFinanzas, UK

hero.title: Citi Double Cash Card Application
hero.description: Apply for the Citi Double Cash Card today and start earning up to 2% cashback on every purchase: 1% when you buy, 1% when you pay.

whyApply: Why Apply for the Citi Double Cash Card?
benefits: Up to 2% cashback on all purchases
0% introductory APR on balance transfers for 18 months
